title: Is a butuan an island? - Quora

response.answer_text: Currently, Butuan is a city located in Mindanao which the second biggest island in the Philippines. Historically, it was thought to be part of region where the Agusan river that run across Mindanao, met the sea and formed a delta and possibly lot of tiny, temporary islands ideal for habitation but at the mercy of annual flooding.
It is not separate island. But its part of mindanao island. It’s just a city that below sea level.
